name: Alarm
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: siren alarm
des:
This a high pitched Siren Alarm that can be used as a security routine that can be activated remotely or triggered with smart devices.

To activate:
Open Siren Alarm

To deactivate:
Stop Siren Alarm
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
